name: Steamed Salmon with Olives and Capers
author: JESSICA83
summary: This steamed salmon is an Australian standard.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
3 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste
1 teaspoon chopped fresh dill, or to taste
directions: Bring 1 to 2 inches of water to a boil in a large saucepan
Season salmon with salt and pepper and sprinkle with 1/2 of the lemon juice; place in a steamer basket
Insert the steamer basket into the saucepan, cover, and steam until salmon is easily flaked with a fork, 7 to 8 minutes
While salmon cooks, whisk olives, olive oil, capers, and remaining lemon juice together in a bowl
Place salmon on serving plates, spoon dressing over top, and sprinkle with dill
